CommitCertificate.summary: The Message that contains a CommitCertificate.

Replica.summary: The of replicas that are present in this commit certificate. The List is composed of tuples composed by the id of the replica and his signature for the response in this CommitCertificate.
Replica.returns: The of replicas that are present in this CommitCertificate.

CommitCertificateMsg.param: The of replicas that are present in this CommitCertificate.
